data.text: @ideasghtv You’re a complete failure if you’re still comparing your achievements to that of your predecessor who you claim to be incompetent. Old age cannot always be associated with wisdom . Clean up your mess
@ideasghtv Stop  comparing and do wat is need
@ideasghtv Hmmm we didn’t vote for you to come and tell us mahama this mahama that, you are the worst President ever in the history of politics in the world
@ideasghtv We’ve voted for you to do it better than him, why now the complains and comparisons. Lol
@ideasghtv He can’t just a simple statement with mentioning Mahama
@ideasghtv He still sleeping 😴. Wake up mr President
